about_the_game:
The once peaceful world has been laid to waste by hordes of strange tar-like demons and your garden is the last bastion of hope left standing. There's only so much time before the forces of evil march on your turf... so, pick up a shovel, and get guardening!

Grow Your Guarden is an action-packed tower defence game where you need to defend against large waves of monsters attacking from all directions. In between each wave you will have a chance to tend to your garden in peace and grow your defences in anticipation of the next attack. You'll need to use everything available to you, including plants, upgrades, and special abilities in order to survive for as long as possible.

Features


  • A wide variety of different plants at your disposal.
  • Loads of upgrades and abilities to shake up and customise your strategy.
  • Lots of different enemies to face off against.
  • Ferocious boss battles.
  • Unlocks and items gained across multiple runs.
  • A relaxed gardening mode.
  • Challenges and special game modes.
